Capote [2005]

In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to
write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood,
Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on
death row.

Starring: Philip Seymour Hoffman,Catherine Keener,Clifton Collins Jr.
Director: Bennett Miller


Video: MPEG2PAL 16:9 720x576

Audio: English, Cesky and Magyar Dolby AC-3/6
       Polski (Voice Over) Dolby AC-3/2
       - Audio commentary with Philip Seymour Hoffman and
         director Bennett Miller Dolby AC-3/2
       - Audio commentary with director Bennett Miller and
         cinematographer Adam Kimmel Dolby AC-3/2
